name: FS19 Pacific P16 Logging Truck
description:
Here is the FS19 version of my Pacific P16 off highway logging truck. Trailer bunks on the truck while empty. I'll do my best to keep this updated as the 22 version moves along since it will be getting trip bunks, a loading strap for the trailer and some other small details in the near future. Hope you enjoy. Stay safe and get logs!

Credits are Snowrunner, Hum3d, Seb Croteau and myself.
